title: How to Make Hot Cocoa (Powder Method)

steps.headline: Warm one cup of milk in the microwave for about 1 minute and 20 seconds (be sure to use a microwave safe mug).
Add other ingredients of your choice, such as whipped cream, marshmallows, cayenne pepper, or cinnamon.

text: Warm one cup of milk in the microwave for about 1 minute and 20 seconds (be sure to use a microwave safe mug).  Add cocoa powder; stir in.  Add sugar; stir in.  Add other ingredients of your choice, such as whipped cream, marshmallows, cayenne pepper, or cinnamon. This is optional.
